mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(seq, title, writer, content) VALUES ((select seq from (select IFNULL(max(seq), 0) + 1 as seq from board)tmp), #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content} WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
